installation.script:
#!/bin/sh
# Switch to mounted directory
cd /mnt/server
# Cleanup previous install if available
find . -maxdepth 1 -name "www" ! -name . -exec rm -rf {} \;
# Download and extract Caddy
version=${CADDY_VERSION}
if [ "$version" = "latest" ]; then version=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/caddyserver/caddy/releases/latest" | grep '"tag_name":' | sed -E 's/.*"([^"]+)".*/\1/' | cut -c2-); fi
if [ ! -d ".caddy" ]; then mkdir .caddy; fi
curl -L https://github.com/caddyserver/caddy/releases/download/v${version}/caddy_${version}_linux_amd64.tar.gz --output caddy.tar.gz
tar -zxvf caddy.tar.gz -C .caddy
rm -rf caddy.tar.gz
# Create default files and directories if not present
if [ ! -d ".caddy" ]; then mkdir .caddy; fi
if [ ! -d ".caddy/data" ]; then mkdir .caddy/data; fi
if [ ! -f "Caddyfile" ]; then curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lazybytez/custom-eggs/master/eggs/caddy/config/Caddyfile --output .caddy/Caddyfile; fi
if [ ! -f ".env" ]; then curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lazybytez/custom-eggs/master/eggs/caddy/config/.env --output .caddy/.env; fi
if [ ! -d "www" ]; then mkdir www; fi
